Title: Sets a cap on penalties for certain unpaid real property tax due and payable or remaining unpaid
Summary: Sets a state-wide three percent cap on penalties for unpaid real property tax due and payable or remaining unpaid during the period from March 7, 2020 to June 30, 2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to setting a state-wide three percent cap on penalties for unpaid real property tax due and payable or remaining unpaid during the period from March 7, 2020 to June 30, 2021
